title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd'. These obfuscated classes are currently displayed prominently in the dialog.
OB: Currently, the obfuscated classes ('a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are shown prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should not be displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To address this issue, I suggest two options:
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely from the Open Type dialog.
